entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behavior of the Console class in Windows Terminal #113895
  • System.IO.Ports.ReadByte() #113889
  • [wasm coreclr] document how to build coreclr on wasm #113885
    Future
  • System.Net.Requests test timeout #113883
  • Queryable.{Aggregate,Count}By accept optional argument values and cannot appear in an Expression tree #113881
  • Queryable.{Max,Min}By overloads accept an IComparer<TSource> instead of IComparer<TKey> #113878
    Future
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert causing app to crash #113874
  • APX: Assertion failed: `IsApxExtendedEvexInstruction(id->idIns())` #113870
    10.0.0
  • APX: Assertion failed 'size == info.compCompHnd->getClassSize(typeHnd)' #113869
    10.0.0
  • cannot import/export a component interface from dotnet.wasm to wasmtime #113868
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #113867

Closed

  • API Change Request: Expression support for ref and readonly ref types #24884
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement UserProxyPrincipal not working as expected #40972
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols - FastConcurrentBind does not work on linux #41617
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25126.21] Autodesk Revit 2025 pop up error report when opening a ".rvt" file. #113158
  • SearchResultCollection does not work with the IEnumerable extension methods in .Net 9. #113265
    10.0.0
  • Add tests for installers and packages #109848
  • Support linking native libraries to cDAC on non-Windows platforms #112416
    10.0.0
  • AltJit hits "Assert failure: reserveUnwindInfo() can only be called before allocMem(), but allocMem() has already been called" #113840
    10.0.0
  • Compatibility issue with noexecstack on Linux x64, arm64? #113767
  • superpmi-diffs failing with AV during replay #113877
    10.0.0
  • ArrayPool<T>.Shared returned null #112778
  • JIT: Missed `i >= 0` assertion #113809
    10.0.0
  • Investigate MsQuic address sanitization in HTTP/3 Stress tests #111854
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `(consume == 0) || (ComputeAvailableSrcCount(tree) == consume)` during 'Linear scan register alloc' #113832
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `genTypeSize(op1) == genTypeSize(simdBaseType)` during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113829
    10.0.0
  • Deserialization crashes when having required init property in nested class and using source generation mode #113841
  • GCStress: GcStressOnDirectCalls by default #5571
  • HeapVerify: Fix BARRIERCHECK #5589
  • Rethink Host Interface to pass properties to CoreCLR #13432
  • PEFile: FlatImageImageLayout created twice for loading R2R images on Unix #13496
  • SingleFile: Consider setting extraction directory within app #3844
  • Loading a single-file app's assembly for reflection #33270
  • Single-File: Json parsing may read beyond the file #35328

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Sve in GetOperForHWIntrinsicId #113906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Activity Events and Links trace out of proc output #113905
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • [APX] Make sure BMI instructions get correct displacement size. #113903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix targets for using the NativeAOT runtime pack as the "target ILC" pack #113902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix AltJit and VectorT ISA specification #113901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [APX] Revert some unexpected code removal. #113898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build Mono's Framework libs in unified builds #113897
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [9.0] libnethost no LTCG #113893
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix VS div-by-0 in DacEnumerableHashTable code #113892
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Add some logging for the new EH #113891
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Two superpmi.py tweaks #113890
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Parallel change to the diagnostic update for GC Info decoder. #113888
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix tracing in host sdk_resolver.cpp #113887
    area-Host
  • Templatize the two SuperPMI collection specifications #113886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SuperPMI collection helix queues #113884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable `this` variable deoptimization on x86/funclets #113882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ThrowControlForThread on x86 funclet platforms #113872
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move "switch recognition" phase to be before "optimize bools" #113866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize ConditionalSelect with const zero when condition is not TYP_MASK #113864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Implement the "compact dispatch sections" optimization from CoreCLR's ComWrappers implementation in NativeAOT's implementation #112461
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: remove single-def restriction from escape analysis type refinement #113808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix break in DirectoryServices SearchResultCollection #113775
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Some SVE fixes for code generation #113860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous flag check #113784
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix asserts from #112728 #113845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113384
    needs-area-label
  • [cDAC] Statically link in native dependencies #113627
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix resetting for JIT retry #113842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #112152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Initialize matrix for enumerators in object stack allocation #113879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup #ifdefs around FindFirstInterruptiblePoint #113873
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Bounds Checks] Make union/intersect operations more precise #113862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HttpStress] Re-enable ASAN for msquic #113669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cut off deep recursion over arrays #113825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use dotnet-install script directly from CDN instead of dot.net #113847
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SslStreamDisposeTest failures during parallel handshake #113834
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Reapply "Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing" #113776
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: SubjectPublicKeyInfo #113846
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Draft : Make operations on fixedRegs less expensive #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Move assembler code from virtualcallstubcpu.hpp to asmhelpers.asm #113828
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Remove most usages of the macro-based "don't return in this block" hack #113856
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fixing stack overflow in System.Private.CoreLib (issue #113189) #113407
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Missing memory barrier leads to crash in multi-threaded scenarios #113740
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.5
  • JIT: Graph-based loop inversion #113709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring up runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension #113678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.16
  • Remove bounds checks for Log2 function in FormattingHelpers.CountDigits #113790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, reduce-unsafe
  • [browser] EventPipe - CPU sampling - single thread #113758
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [APX] Make sure KMOV is not encoded in EVEX when JitStressEvexEncoding is set. #113854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix assertions related to combining `cmn (extended-register)` (#113337) #113376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some basic tests for SLH-DSA #113766
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Skip encoding mixing test in fuzzer when SkipValidation=true #111596
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [browser] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Deduplicate base interfaces from another assembly in COM generator #111931
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Propagate exceptions in `GetAddressInfoExCallback` #113444
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for comparisons against 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
